alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Mathews; Middlesex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 3:18PM EDT until August 10 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gloucester County in eastern Virginia... Southeastern Middlesex County in eastern Virginia... Mathews County in eastern Virginia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 318 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hartfield to near Gloucester Courthouse, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hartfield around 325 PM EDT. Gloucester Courthouse around 340 PM EDT. Blakes around 350 PM EDT. Mathews, Hayes, Gwynn and Mobjack around 400 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Ruff, Beulah, Moon, Laban, Glass, Naxera, Harmony Village, Grafton, Harcum and Cash. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
